app_description: Pokéfuta Tracker helps you record visits to Pokémon manhole covers (Poke Lids) in Japan
about_description: Pokéfuta Tracker is a web app for recording your visits to Poké Lids (Pokéfuta), artistic covers for utility holes. Currently {{count}} Poké Lids data are available.
help_list_page: A page that displays Poké Lids from all over Japan organized by prefecture. You can also search for Poké Lids using place names or Pokémon names.
help_list_page_tip1: You can long-press a Poké Lid to mark it as visited without opening the detail page.
help_details_page: A page that displays detailed information about Poké Lids.
help_map_page: A page where you can check the location of Poké Lids on a map. You can also use GPS to search for Poké Lids around your current location.
help_progress_page: A page where you can visually check your visit status on a map of Japan and check your visit rate by region.
help_settings_page: A page for various settings and data import/export.
map_nearby_pokefutas: Pokéfutas around the center of the map
geolocation_notice: To search for Pokéfutas around you using GPS, please allow this app to access your location.
geolocation_notice_privacy: All location data used by this app is processed within your device only and will not be shared with anyone including the developer.
geolocation_error: Failed to get location data. Please check location permission settings in your browser.
reset_confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset the data?
reset_warning: Resetting the data will erase all visited status of Pokéfutas. This action cannot be undone.
